title: Judiciary in Dem and Auth Regimes

content.question:
Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate.

Compare judicial functions in two different AP Comparative and Government Politics course countries. In your response, do the following:
Define rule of law.
Choose two different AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries that use different methods to select judges. Describe the method for each country.
For each of the two AP Comparative government and Politics course countries described in (b), explain the implications of the different judicial selection processes on the judiciary's function within each government.

frqParts.text:

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
